dict.acceptation: 触摸；使某物与…轻轻接触；吃或喝，尝；[数]与…相切；
触摸，碰；触觉，触感；修饰，润色；痕迹；

sent.orig: TOUCH intention paper · diary, puppet series, Christmas Day tender sentiments are listed.
sent.trans: TOUCH意纸·记事本，木偶系列，圣诞温情上市。

sent.orig: Touch your toes. Teddy Bear. Touch your toes. Teddy Bear. Touch! Touch.
sent.trans: 把你的脚趾摸一摸。玩具熊。把你的脚趾摸一摸。玩具熊。摸一摸。摸一摸。

sent.orig: Touch-screen technology, using 5800 resistive touch screen, rather than capacitive touch screen.
sent.trans: 触摸屏技术方面，5800采用电阻式触摸屏，而不是电容式触摸屏。

sent.orig: Touch your toes. Teddy Bear. Touch! Touch.
sent.trans: 把你的脚趾摸一摸。玩具熊。摸一摸！摸一摸。

sent.orig: Can't touch this! Can't touch this! Can't touch this!
sent.trans: 拿不到呀！拿不到呀！拿不到呀！
